name: Force of Nature
simpleDescription: Move Speed, Magic Resist, and max Health Regeneration

passives.name: Steadfast
passives.effects: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 8 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Each incoming basic attack, ability per cast instance, or item effect can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast from their damage every 1 second. At maximum stacks, gain 70 bonus magic resistance and 6% bonus movement speed.
